edu.ucla.sspace.text

Class TermAssociationFinder

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.ucla.sspace.text.TermAssociationFinder
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, Iterable<Map.Entry<Pair<String>,Double>>

    public class TermAssociationFinder
extends Object
implements Iterable<Map.Entry<Pair<String>,Double>>, Serializable
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      TermAssociationFinder(SignificanceTest test)
      Creates a new TermAssociationFinder using the specified test, which will only record associations between all terms that appear together in the same context.
      TermAssociationFinder(SignificanceTest test, Set<String> leftTerms, Set<String> rightTerms)
      Creates a new TermAssociationFinder using the specified test, which will only record associations between two terms t1 and t2 if leftTerms.contains(t1) and rightTerms.contains(t2) or the commutative equivalent.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addContext(Set<String> tokens) 
      double getAssociationScore(String t1, String t2) 
      SignificanceTest getTest() 
      Iterator<Map.Entry<Pair<String>,Double>> iterator()
      Returns an iterator over all the bigram pairs with their corresponding association scores

        Creates a new TermAssociationFinder using the specified test, which will only record associations between two terms t1 and t2 if leftTerms.contains(t1) and rightTerms.contains(t2) or the commutative equivalent.
